Windlord/BlackFang:

Windlord and Blackfang arrived and searchd the injured Maxinmal, 
when they find him, they took of the fallen pod and carried him to a 
safe distance where they started a quick check



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> The escape pod ran out of fuel and started tilting halfway in the 
> atmosphere. Gravity shook it and pulled it directly towards a 
rocky 
> formation in the middle of an orchard.
> 
> Templar regained some semblance of consciousness as he saw clouds 
> passing around him. He reflexively touched the controls and 
> stabilized the pod just enough.
> 
> The fall, however, was far from stable. The pod hit the ground and 
> leapt three or four timesin the air and finally stopped at the 
base 
> of the rocky hill.
> 
> All that remained of the pod was a battered hull...
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Windlord:
> >  
> > Windlord looked Kenzo and reached him and said "My pal if you 
> aren't 
> > in conditions to follow up... come back base and use Cr's"
> >

through

he
